definition: to tax by force and extort levies (idiom); to screw taxes out of the people by force

horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
to invite/to recruit/to levy (taxes)/to draft (troops)/phenomenon/symptom/characteristic sign (used as proof)/evidence
journey/trip/expedition/to go on long campaign/to attack
to hold back/to restrain/to control (oneself)/to collect/Taiwan pr. [lian4]

sentences.english: Because of requisitions, land was being abandoned and whole families were drowning themselves in village wells.
sentences.chinese: 横征暴敛使土地荒芜，整家整户的人被迫投井自杀。

definition: The people have no way to make a living (idiom, from Record of the Grand Historian 史記|史记[Shi3 ji4])/no way of getting by
lit. the fat and wealth of the people (idiom); the nation's hard-won wealth (esp. as an object of unscrupulous exploitation)/the people's blood, sweat and tears
the people's livelihood is reduced to destitution (idiom); a time of famine and impoverishment
to engage in wars of aggression at will (idiom)/militaristic/bellicose
grasping officials, corrupt mandarins (idiom); abuse and corruption
to indulge in a life of luxury (idiom); extreme extravagance
corruption and abuse of the law (idiom); to take bribes and bend the law
